title: Two small spheres at corners equilaterial triangle

content.description: In the figure above, two small spheres, each with charge +Q, are fixed in place at the corners of an equilateral triangle. Point I is at the third corner, and point II is midway between the charges.
content.question: A small particle with charge +q, where q << Q, is moved from point I to point II at constant speed v by an external force. WEXT is the work done by the external force on the moving charge, and WELEC is the work done by the electrostatic force. Which of the following correctly identifies the signs of these quantities?

choices.label: None of the above, since the work done by both the external force and the electrostatic force is zero.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
